title: Home
text:
Zhenlong Zhang
Hello! Iâ€™m a graduate student in Mental Health at Johns Hopkins University, and my research interest is using Reinforcement Learning or Large Language Models to understand decision making. The photo attached is my student ID.



Student ID

title: About
text: I am passionate about studying cognitive processes and decision-making. I have extensive experience in computational modeling, including reinforcement learning and machine learning, and have contributed to projects involving language models to predict task performance based on strategy articulation. I am also proficient in programming with Python and R, and fluent in Mandarin and English. My practical experience includes mentoring underrepresented teens and supporting individuals with disabilities in understanding their unique needs.
